amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should repeal the 1993 tax increase on Social Security benefits and eliminate wasteful spending, such as spending on unnecessary tax loopholes, in order to fully offset the cost of such repeal and avoid forcing taxpayers to pay substantially more interest to foreign creditors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 207 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 0. Record Vote Number: 27.
